title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 171.2 - Definition of employer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 171.2 - Definition of employer

State Regulations

An employer is any person or organization qualifying as
an employer for Federal income tax withholding purposes and maintaining an
office or transacting business within New York State, whether or not a paying
agency is maintained within New York State. (See also Part 177 of this Article
with respect to designation of third parties to perform acts required of
employers.)

Notes

171.2
